tool.name: tool_3

param.name: MINSLOPE
param.dialogReference:
Minimum Slope [Degree]

Floating point

Minimum: 0.000000

Default: 0.010000

minimum slope angle preserved from one cell to the next, zero results in flat areas [Degree]

tool.summary: Depression filling algorithm after Olivier Planchon & Frederic Darboux (2001).
